name: 3*3 Maguc Square Puzzle
author: Alucard648
description: 3*3 grid of numbers from 1 to 9 without repeats. The goal is to arrange numbers so every row, column, and diagonal has equal sum of the numbers.
setup: 1. Check out constants on top of script file.2. Set up 9 consequtive combos for numbers 1 through 9.3. import and compile the script.4. Build shuffled 3*3 grid in the screen. Make sure that each combo from step 2 is used exactly once.5. Place FFC with assigned script on the top left corner of grid from step 4.// D0 - ID of the 1st combo in sequence from step 2.
